sentences.sContent: To the chagrin of their parents, neither Phil nor Pam went to church anymore.
sentences.sCn: 令父母失望的是，菲尔和帕姆都再也不去教堂了。

remMethod.val: cha(拼音： 茶) + grin(苦笑) → 喝茶苦笑 → 失望， 懊恼

trans.tranCn: 懊恼, 气愤, 委屈
trans.tranOther: annoyance and disappointment because something has not happened the way you hoped
